org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io

Class AbstractDescriptionWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io.AbstractDescriptionWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DescriptionWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashDescriptionWriter, StringDescriptionWriter

    public abstract class AbstractDescriptionWriter
extends Object
implements DescriptionWriter

    Base class to help implementing DescriptionWriters.

    Since:
    2.1

      • putField

        public DescriptionWriter putField(String name,
                                  Object value)
        Description copied from interface: DescriptionWriter

        Put an object field into the description.

        Specified by:
        putField in interface DescriptionWriter
        Parameters:
        name - The field name. It cannot begin with an underscore.
        value - The field value. It is described with Descriptions.defaultDescriber()}.

      • putList

        public DescriptionWriter putList(String name,
                                 Iterable<?> objects)
        Description copied from interface: DescriptionWriter

        Put a field with a list of values, using the default describer.

        Specified by:
        putList in interface DescriptionWriter
        Parameters:
        name - The field name.
        objects - The list of objects.
        Returns:
        The description writer (for chaining).
